title: Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation: A Reading List (2022 and Earlier
This list provides a selection of articles on non-autoregressive (NAR) sequence generation, focusing on key concepts, advancements, and applications. It's organized by topic for easier navigation
**"Neural Machine Translation with Reconstruction
-** Introduces the concept of reconstruction as a key component in NAR models
**"Fast Decoding in Neural Machine Translation with Non-Autoregressive Inferences
-** Explores the potential of NAR models for faster decoding in machine translation
-** Presents a foundational NAR model for machine translation, highlighting its advantages and limitations
**"Parallel Decoding for Neural Machine Translation
-** Introduces parallel decoding as a technique for improving efficiency in NAR models
Architectures and Techniques:**
-** Adapts the Transformer architecture for NAR machine translation, achieving significant performance gains
**"Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Enhanced Positional Encoding
-** Investigates the role of positional encoding in NAR models and proposes improvements
**"Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Scheduled Sampling
-** Explores the use of scheduled sampling to improve the training process of NAR models
**"Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Global Context
-** Introduces a global context mechanism to enhance the performance of NAR models
**"Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Iterative Refinement
-** Proposes an iterative refinement approach to address the limitations of single-pass NAR models
**"Non-Autoregressive Text Generation with BERT
-** Explores the application of NAR models for text generation using the BERT language model
**"Non-Autoregressive Speech Recognition
-** Investigates the use of NAR models for speech recognition, demonstrating their potential for real-time applications
**"Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages
-** Explores the application of NAR models for machine translation in low-resource scenarios
-** Demonstrates the effectiveness of NAR models for generating concise summaries of text documents
**"Non-Autoregressive Dialogue Generation
-** Explores the use of NAR models for generating natural and coherent dialogue responses
Challenges and Future Directions:**
**"Challenges and Opportunities in Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation
-** Discusses the challenges and future directions for research in NAR sequence generation
**"Improving Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation with Language Modeling
-** Explores the use of language modeling techniques to improve the quality of NAR translations
**"Towards More Efficient and Accurate Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation
-** Discusses the need for further research on efficiency and accuracy in NAR models
**"Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation: A Survey
-** Provides a comprehensive overview of the field, covering key concepts, architectures, and applications
**"Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation with Generative Adversarial Networks
-** Explores the use of generative adversarial networks (GANs) for training NAR models
**"Non-Autoregressive Sequence Generation with Reinforcement Learning
-** Investigates the use of reinforcement learning techniques for optimizing NAR models
**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and represents a selection of influential articles. Further research and exploration are encouraged to delve deeper into the field of NAR sequence generation
